sentences.english: The Folk Songs of Northern Shaanxi is the most representative artistic form ofthe Loess Culture.
sentences.chinese: 陕北民歌是黄土文化中最具代表性的艺术形式。

sentences.english: The characteristics of the extra words in Zhaotong Han nationality's folk songs reflect these two connotations.
sentences.chinese: 昭通汉族民歌衬词的特点体现了这两方面的内涵。

sentences.english: The third, Hubei Jiangguiying to a new generation of folk singers singing inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 蒋桂英湖北民歌演唱给新一代演唱者的启示。

sentences.english: If you're lucky, the staff will serenade you with North Korean folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 如果幸运的话，服务员还会献上几曲朝鲜民歌。
一个民歌手的随意的演唱风格。

sentences.english: Wife, Children and Friends, folk song for voice & piano trio.
sentences.chinese: 妻子，孩子和朋友，为人声和钢琴而作的三重唱民歌。

sentences.english: Call Tune - a modern musical «language» mixed dialects from traditional Norwegian folk music.
sentences.chinese: 音乐剧《语言》乐曲，糅合挪威民歌曲风。

sentences.english: No More, My Mary, folk song for voice & piano trio.
sentences.chinese: 不会超过我的玛丽，为人声和钢琴而作的三重唱民歌。

sentences.english: She is playing a folk-song next.
sentences.chinese: 她接着要演奏一曲民歌。

sentences.english: The King'n Trio entertained attendees with their folk songs and Rotary-themed lyrics.
sentences.chinese: 三重唱用他们的民歌和扶轮主题的歌曲来款待与会者。

sentences.english: I give pointers on how to do most of the quests in Outland.
sentences.chinese: 中国民歌榜如何提升伊金霍洛旗的影响力？

sentences.english: Considerable debate surrounds the origins of the word " Flamenco ".
sentences.chinese: 对于“弗拉门科民歌”一词的起源有很大的争议。

sentences.english: Tibetan folk song cadence, rhyme Hezhe paste, attractive.
sentences.chinese: 藏族民歌抑扬顿挫，合辙贴韵，悦耳动听。

sentences.english: Crumb calls "Shenandoah" one of the most beautiful folk songs of any country.
sentences.chinese: 糠所说的“雪兰”之一的任何国家最美丽的民歌。

sentences.english: Yuefu folksongs in the South and North Dynasties are of special charm in the history of ancient Chinese folksongs.
sentences.chinese: 南北朝乐府歌辞在中国古代民歌史上具有独特的魅力。

sentences.english: I've never heard Chinese folk songs before, are they any good?
sentences.chinese: 我还没有听过中国民歌，好听吗？
